GIT Stash

28 Oct 2014

If you make you want to upgrade your local repository with the latest changes, e.g. merge with non commited local files you can use the command stash.

` //Stash the current work git stash

//Check status, should be empty git status

//Get the list of stashes git stash list

//â€¦..Do operations e.g. git pull

//Apply the stash again git stash apply

//Check status, the stashed files should be marked as before git status `
